title: Britney Spears shares bikini-clad throwback snaps from her sun-soaked Miami break with her beau Sam Asghari
text:

Britney Spears shared a number of bikini-clad holiday throwback snaps, taken from her Miami break in June, onto her Instagram account on Friday.

The pop sensation, 37, appeared smitten with her beau Sam Asghari, 25, in the lovely photos that showed them soaking up the sun on a yacht as well as cute couple selfies.

In one snap, Britney sat behind her hunky man as she wrapped her legs around his chiselled torso as they sat on the bow of the water vessel.

Another offering showed the bombshell flaunting her gym-honed physique as she laid alongside Sam in a yellow bandeau bikini top and black briefs.

The final image was an adorable selfie where the former Disney star stuck her tongue out as her boyfriend beamed as he rested his head on her shoulders.

(Image: Instagram)

Ready for the sun the couple wore caps and sunglasses.

Reminiscing in the caption, the Womanizer singer wrote: "I always have a great time with this one @samasghari #tbt."

Britney's summertime snaps come amid her battle to take back control of her life.

The singer has been the subject of a conservatorship for the past decade - her every expense has been under the eye of dad Jamie and attorney Andrew M Wallet.

The arrangement has been surrounded by drama, as Jamie's position has been questioned.

(Image: Instagram)

A source told TMZ that although Lynne, Britney's mum, wanted Jamie out of his position, the judge was having none of it.

He will, however, take a break from his duties until January next year, with care manager Jodi Montgomery taking the reins until then.

Britney found herself with this financial arrangement after a series of events that had those close to her worried about her mental health.

In early 2008, at the age of 24, she was hospitalised twice, and this caused those around the singer to believe a guardian might be a good shout.

Britney had shaved her head in full view of the paparazzi in 2007, after months of unusual behaviour.

(Image: Instagram)

The conservatorship was put in place in October 2008.

Peter Katsis, who was on Britney's management team at the time, revealed to the New York Times: "It clearly wasn't working with her in control of the ship. It was overwhelming for her when she came of age."

Mum Lynne once told Rolling Stone of her daughter: "When I look at Britney, I see both a woman and a girl. When she's home, at night she sleeps with me.

"She has her own bedroom, but she wants to sleep with me. She's a little girl.

"But then I hear her on the phone with her business, and she is such a taskmaster."
description: The Toxic hitmaker uploaded some pictures from her summer holiday with her handsome other half
